name: Shree Children Education Trust

address: Helping Hands, Patel Faliya,Gotib, Ta. Santampur,

briefDescription: We work for mentally disturbed / retarded people from  street.They can often be seen eating from rotten garbage or drinking water from gutters. We bring them in asylum refresh them, accommodate them, feed them with three times meal,medicate them, trasform them. More then 100 of people got transformed and united with their families.

address: Patel Faliya, Gotib , Ta. Santrampur, Dist. Mahisagar,
